cultural.eventDescription: A typical Indian Bollywood singing game
cultural.name: View Finder
cultural.round1Description:
These are the topics on which you have to submit photos on viewfinder16@gmail.com.
	Topics are:
		1. Black and white.
		2. Fire
		3. Happiness
cultural.round2Description: You have to submit photos that you will take in two days of Udaan'16. Topic will be given

cultural.eventDescription: A typical Indian Bollywood singing game
cultural.name: Antakshari

cultural.eventDescription: It is kind of a Bollywood quiz.
cultural.name: Bolly-mix-Bolly

cultural.eventDescription: Cook with given ingredients and sell for maximum profit
cultural.name: Bakers and Sellers
cultural.round1Description: prepare a dish from given ingredients.
cultural.round2Description: sell it to get highest revenue .

cultural.eventDescription: Participants have to dub the given video without any vulgar content
cultural.name: Scene-e-Magic
cultural.round1Description: Prepare one out of the given videos.
cultural.round2Description: Random selection of video from round, about 45 minute will be given.

cultural.name: Tansing
cultural.round1Description: shortlisting from audio videos received by mails
cultural.round2Description: singing competition of shortlisted participants with one accompanist or karaoke.

girls-special.eventDescription: Try your luck - perform, decode and design
girls-special.name: Kudii Kamaal Diii
girls-special.round1Description: Each participant have to perform one of the pre-decided four 'Minute to win it' games to get to the second round
girls-special.round2Description: Decode the vent with your partner - the team of two girls will cross the parth by remembering the different codes to complete it

girls-special.eventDescription: Solve crossword show your creative skills and see whats left out!Q
girls-special.name: Dhinchak Damshels!!
girls-special.round1Description: Participants will have to solve a crossword puzzle using the clues given
girls-special.round2Description: Participants will have to show their creative skills and do a makeover. There will be a twist

non-tech.name: Treasure Hunt
non-tech.round2Description: Selfie le lein re - Take a selfie with the person after solving the clue

non-tech.eventDescription: Get your gang together & let's see how much you know each other.
non-tech.name: My Gang
non-tech.round1Description: The event consists of 3 members. In round 1 all the 3 members will be given forms which they all have to fill it up indvidually. The form would consists of primary details of their group, for Eg; their favorite hanging spot, favorite food place etc. Judgement would be done on the basis of number of similar answers in all the 3 forms.
non-tech.round2Description: The selected team will be given the name of an product, they'll have to prepare the ad for the product given in time allotted. Uniqueness of the ad will decide the marks.
non-tech.round3Description: For round 3, the selected teams will be given a prop,using that prop they have to make a dubsmash video and upload it on youtube in the given time period. A deadline will be decided for uploading the video, video uploaded after that time won't be taken into consideration.

non-tech.eventDescription: Wanna check how much you know about VVN/Anand?? Than let's do some velagiri..!
non-tech.name: The Vela
non-tech.round1Description: A quiz based on "know your city". Questions in the quiz would be related to Anand/VVN.
non-tech.round2Description: 2nd round is a bathroom singer round. The participants have to sing as long as they can, certain acts would be allotted which they have to do it while singing. Once they stop, they are out. How you sing is not important here, but how long you sing is very important. Time will be a major factor for judging in this round.
non-tech.round3Description: 3rd round will be a surprise round based on physical tasks or could even be co-ordination and strategical tasks.

non-tech.eventDescription: Friends, GOT, BBT, Suits, Blacklist, etc etc..!!
non-tech.name: The Cocktail
non-tech.round1Description: Its a quiz round. Questions would be related to few of the TV series like FRIENDS, GOT, BBT, BLACKLIST, SUITS, ARROW, etc..
non-tech.round2Description: Its a dumb-charades round. all the participants would be assigned a partner. Now the game would follow in a team of 2. One participant will be told a character from the TV series and he'll have to act the character, the other participant will identify what character he's acting.
non-tech.round3Description: Now in round 3, we'll the divide the participants into the team of 4. Each participant will be given a character he has to act on, and a situation will be given to the team. Now the team has to put on the characters given to them and have to act the situation given by us.

non-tech.eventDescription: The game, Mrs Hudson, is On!!
non-tech.name: LAN Gaming

non-tech.eventDescription: Trust the dots, everything is intentional.
non-tech.name: Connect the Dots
non-tech.round1Description: It is a quiz round consisting of match the following, fill-up MCQs. They have to find connection between words
non-tech.round2Description: Person will be taken to a place outside BVM where they will be given an amount of rupees to get back to college with maximum money.
non-tech.round3Description:
In this LUDO game is played. Three photos will be given during game, they have to identified persons
ask the set of question, and find odd one out from answers.

non-tech.eventDescription: Jack of all trades, Master of none.
non-tech.name: Bid The Best
non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on general knowledge, aptitude, and common sense.
non-tech.round3Description: Bidding on pictures and making ad using those pictures.

non-tech.eventDescription: Partners in crime, passion in rhymes!
non-tech.name: Partners in Crime
non-tech.round1Description: Puzzle, match, rectify the errors, 4 pic 1 word.
non-tech.round2Description: Clue to pathway leads to crossword which leads to logical questions.

non-tech.eventDescription: Be the wolf and win the Oscar..!!
non-tech.name: Wallstreet
non-tech.round1Description: It is a virtual online stock exchange game wherein participants will be provided with virtual money. They can use that money for trading the stocks. The event will be kept online for 2 days. The participant with the highest amount will be the winner.

non-tech.eventDescription: Solving the Clue
non-tech.name: Far Away Fast
non-tech.round1Description: Logical Quiz +brain teaser+ logo quiz + GK
non-tech.round2Description: Team have to take selfies at a given particular places in the college campus.
non-tech.round3Description: Solve clue & guess the final place in the campus.

non-tech.eventDescription: Event based on mutual understanding between two strange person
non-tech.name: Let us be Friends
non-tech.round1Description: Form a pair, give them time to know each other, then form fill up
non-tech.round2Description: one of them have to guide their other partner to follow a specific path.

non-tech.eventDescription: beg, borrow & steal
non-tech.name: SOTY
non-tech.round1Description: Written round(Logical question) for one participant. With 2 physical task for the other 2.
non-tech.round2Description: the selected teams will  given 3 task to complete in the channel(eating, running, cycling).
non-tech.round3Description: Surprise round in V. V. Nagar(Beg, Borrow, Steal)

non-tech.eventDescription: Related to Game of thrones Series
non-tech.name: Valar Morghulis
non-tech.round1Description: Quiz Based on Game Of Thrones
non-tech.round3Description: Give them different houses & based on situation they will find iron throne

non-tech.eventDescription: Bid for the best
non-tech.name: Cricket Fantasy
non-tech.round1Description:
Round 1 will have 2 parts. Both will be considered. 
--> In first part, Each team will select any 5 players from both the teams playing 1st Semifinal of T20 world cup. The deadline to send the team is before the first ball is bowled for that match.Teams will receive points according to performance of their players in the match.You need to choose a captain from those 5 players whose points get doubled.All this stuff will be mailed to all participants.
--> In 2nd part, A quiz on cricket will be taken.
non-tech.round2Description:
Selected teams will select a 11 player teams from both the teams playing 2nd semifinal. 
o	Teams will receive points according to performance of their players in the match.
non-tech.round3Description:
In this round, Selected teams will be given list of the players. 
o	Each teams will have fixed budget. They will bid for players in auction they wanted.The team which make best team in budget, Will be declared winner. Your team must consist of:
•	At least 4 Batsmen
•	At least 1 All Rounder
•	1 Wicketkeeper
•	At least 2 Bowlers

non-tech.eventDescription: Survival of the fittest
non-tech.name: Takeshi's Castle
non-tech.round1Description: In this round we will give one ball and two balloon each team have to take that ball at required place with the help of balloon.
non-tech.round2Description: surprise round , they have to perform a task only
non-tech.round3Description: surprise round and they have to perform a task

non-tech.eventDescription: Connect the dots
non-tech.name: Mind Mistry
non-tech.round1Description:
Spell-bee:-
             8 pronunciations will be given to each group and time limit 2 minute.(10)points will be given to each correct answer.
non-tech.round2Description:
video graphy:-
only one question will be asked after one video.maximum time limit  to give The answer is 2 minute.correct answer (20 ) wrong answer (-10).
non-tech.round3Description:
clue round:-
          1.   3 clue will be given to candidate.
            1st clue-hard
            2 nd clue-medium
            3 rd-easy
         2.
             1st clue (30) points
             2 nd clue(20) points
             3 rd clue(10) points

non-tech.eventDescription: Run for fun
non-tech.name: Finding Funny
non-tech.round1Description: In this round we will give 25 to 30 name to all participants and they have to collect all that things.(things will be like a small pencil of wood, grass with v shape, etc which will be easy to find on campus only)
non-tech.round2Description: they have to take a selfie with the required things, person ,etc
non-tech.round3Description: we will give a map of BVM in different way and they have to solve that and perform required task.

non-tech.eventDescription: want be an officer? Be ready cadets….there is a chance for you.
non-tech.name: S.S.B(Military)
non-tech.round1Description: Quiz based on mental ability and PPDT (Picture Perception and Discussion Test).
non-tech.round2Description: Group task on set-up provided by team.
non-tech.round3Description: Conference interview in front of panel of 7-8 jury.

non-tech.eventDescription: Let’s be leaders of tomorrow. Parliament style debate will be conducted.
non-tech.name: Youth Parliament
non-tech.round1Description: Participants will be divided in 3 groups (Ruling party, Opposition party, Decision Making party) and parliamentary style debate has to be done and bill is to be passed in parliament.
non-tech.round2Description: Debate between both winning parties for and against the topic (for both).

non-tech.eventDescription:
Cricket full of funny, weird amazing brain storming rules.
Cricket with weird amazing rules like gully cricket will be played. 
4 players/team and overs: 4
non-tech.name: De Ghuma Ke(Crazy Cricket)

non-tech.eventDescription:
Not everything can be achieved in a minute except few. Can you?
Interesting games are to be complete by participants in team in one minute.
non-tech.name: Win It in a Minute

non-tech.eventDescription:
Discover the Aryabhatta within you. Come play!
The whole event is about checking your intelligence and knowledge of the science, maths , GK , puzzles ,etc. There will be different rounds for enjoying your favourite topics at increasing level of questions. It will be played in a team of two.
non-tech.name: Arya bhatta: The Mastermind

non-tech.eventDescription:
Two makes company. Three makes the winning team!
Mental and verbal ability test, Clue solving in which they get photo solution, Surprises. Make the best of three. Become the Trowinner!
non-tech.name: Triathion

non-tech.eventDescription:
Become a marketing virtuoso. Be the Boss. Be the Guru.
Become the ultimate marketing virtuoso. Become the boss of betting. Become the Guru. Display your business skills. Enjoy your passion!
non-tech.name: Guru

non-tech.eventDescription:
Is This a Highway To Hell or the Stairway to Heaven?
Unleash the best of your personality. Complete the tasks and make the best out of what comes your way. Where does this path lead you to? Is this the Highway to Hell? Or the Stairway to Heaven?
non-tech.name: Roadies

non-tech.eventDescription:
Can you rise above the evil plot?
Use your brain and buy your tasks the right way. Climb the ladder of evil plots and kick away your hurdles. Display your team’s compatibility and rise above the evil plots. Unveil The Dark Secret.
non-tech.name: The Dark Secrets

non-tech.eventDescription:
Did you miss me?
Become the ultimate highly functioning sociopath. Can you beat the race against wit and time? Or will you fail your case? Use your tricks and play your cards to unlock the mystery. Become the Sherlock of this age!
non-tech.name: Sherlock Overloaded

events.eventDescription: Related to Automobile & recent developments in it
events.name: Auto Techno
events.round1Description: Automobile Quiz
events.round2Description: Car Comparison (Optional- If No. of entries are more)
events.round3Description: Automobile Problem is given and solution is presented by participants

events.eventDescription: Making of boat from given material & checking its performance
events.name: Hydrobounze
events.round1Description: Elimination Round related to fluid mechanics
events.round2Description: Boat is to be prepared from material given by us.

events.eventDescription: Mechanical Treasure Hunt
events.name: Mech Chase
events.round1Description: Open book exam from Elememts of Mech Engg subject.
events.round2Description: Riddle round: Selected teams have to solve riddle from which they will get next clue.
events.round3Description: Treasure hunt : this round is same as 2nd round but here they will be given a cut piece of pic of specific location of BVM. They have to reorient the pieces , identify the location & have to reach there.

events.eventDescription:
Related to a crane (made of specific materials) Fight
Rules :-
-During fight if any one of 4motion is restricted = Disqualify.
-Fight will be one to one.
-If the robot crosses particular boundry within which it has to stand=Disqualify.
-Maximum time limit for single fight is 150sec.If any robot will not be defeated then both are disqualify.
events.name: Cavador

events.eventDescription: Pneumatic gun which uses pressurized air for shooting paint ball
events.name: Sharp Shooter
events.round1Description: Plastic glasses in pyramid shape, Fall the glasses by shooting
events.round2Description: Circular Target bord-Shooting
events.round3Description: Moving target

events.eventDescription: car run by using chemical reaction
events.name: The Thrust
events.round1Description: Elimination based on distance covered by car.
events.round2Description: Marking based on explanation & design of car.
events.round3Description: winner based on explanation and distance covered after passing from obstacle.

events.eventDescription: Learn,Practice and Master
events.name: CAD-Mania
events.round1Description: You will be taught basic tools of AutoCAD.(No Elimination)
events.round2Description: You can Practice Basic Tools in CAD lab.(No Elimination)
events.round3Description: You will be given a drawing to make in CAD in given time.

events.eventDescription: Ornithopter- Learn, make & let it fly high
events.name: Tech Flight
events.round1Description: The participant team will be shown demo of making an ornithopter. Each team make their ornithhopter and let it fly in air with more time and high distance ( material will be provided )

events.eventDescription: Get back to the class of physics and then go on ON THE GO MACHINE.
events.name: The Psycho Physicist
events.round1Description: The teams have to anaylze the problem based on priciples of physics & have to predict the reason of the questions on the basis of the analysis they did.
events.round2Description: Round 2 is  based in goldberg mechanism. They have to use the given props and have to create a ON THE GO MACHINE  type mechanism

events.eventDescription: First answer, than find a clue & lastly present the case.
events.name: Pro Mech Hunting
events.round1Description: 1st round is a screening round – a quiz based on EME, MOS, EG, general knowledge, aptitude, verbal ability etc.
events.round2Description: 2nd round is a treasure hunt, clues would be tech and non-tech based both. The answers they’ll get from the clues will have questions for case study in final round.
events.round3Description: The questions team have got in 2nd round, now they have to prepare a case study for those questions. Case study is to be presented in the form of sheets to the jury. Jury will declare the final winner.

events.eventDescription: Be the Phunsukh Wangdu(3 idiots) – Re-assemble it & see what’s left out.
events.name: Reverse Engineering
events.round1Description: A quiz based on concepts of reverse engineering.
events.round2Description: A working toy will be shown to the selected teams for round 2. After some time the same toy will be given to the teams in a dissembled form. Their task would be to reassemble the toy wihtout any component being leftout. A certain time period will be fixed for the task.

events.eventDescription:
Let The Bot Do The Talk!
Teams will be competing against each other on the track with numbers of obstacles to get the maximum number of balls into their court. Let’s see who takes the ball!!
events.name: Bot Ball

events.eventDescription: Battle Among  The Bests . Race On!
events.name: Imperial Race
events.round1Description: Hurdle race. Base on point table teams will qualify for next round
events.round2Description: Crossing a maze . 4 teams  compete in the mazefirst will be eligible for next round
events.round3Description: Capture the flag . two teams will complete all the flags & reach to enemies territory would be the winner.

events.eventDescription:
Scarcity Engenders Ingenuity.
An event which focuses on the technical skills of the student. There would be a technical quiz in the beginning which would be followed by a technical debate on the topics provided by us .The last round would be hypothetical problem solving .
events.name: Crack The Nut

events.eventDescription: Unleash The Decoder Within You!
events.name: Crazy Codes
events.round1Description: One member gets the code and has to convey it in binary form using laser. The other person, being the receiver decodes the received message. For eg: If two lasers are ON=‘1’.If one laser is OFF=’0’. The time taken to decode the message will be noted down and the teams will be short- listed accordingly.
events.round2Description: the teams will be given incomplete circuits and the missing components will be placed at different locations. Hence following these clues the circuit will be completed and the top 5 reporting teams will go further.
events.round3Description: surprise round!

events.eventDescription:
Interpret The Technical Language!
An interesting game of technical knowledge mixed with the fun of perceptions and dumb charades and treasure hunt. Test your presence of mind.
•	Wild card entry in the final round
•	Crossword puzzles
•	An event designed for all, freshers and seniors
events.fees: 30 per team (15 for wildcard in 3rd round)
events.name: Electro-Charades

events.eventDescription: Programs Can Be Fun, So Can Be Cryptography; However They Shouldn’t Be Combined, Or You Have A Mystery.
events.name: Code-e-tronics
events.round1Description: Simple C language and Arduino based quiz
events.round2Description: Arduino based coding based on your level
events.round3Description: Selected students have to simulate arduino program on proteus. They can have good opportunity to learn python programming language

events.eventDescription: Battle Of The Technical Minds
events.name: Wall-e-Tronics
events.round1Description: solve the cross and find the word
events.round2Description: speak up and make it to the last. 10 levels of questions
events.round3Description: Use the creativity. Circuit implementation

events.eventDescription: Diffuse the bomb and steal the diamond
events.name: Crack It
events.round1Description: studying the circuit provided to the candidate and the candidate has to answer the questions based on the circuit
events.round2Description: Diffusing the bomb which is in the form of digital circuits (Logic Gates)
events.round3Description: Stealing the diamond by clearing the Security System

events.eventDescription: Prepare yourself for producing energy.
events.name: Power Rangers
events.round1Description: Basic quiz on Power plant
events.round2Description: Identify the various equipment of the power plant shown in the presentation
events.round3Description: Endorse yourself and debate with the rest of your power plant as in you are a Power plant

events.eventDescription: Be a master and rule the machine.
events.name: The Machinist
events.round1Description: Quiz on machines
events.round2Description: Viva on basic problems of electrical machines.
events.round3Description: Performing actual tests on the electrical Lab .

events.eventDescription: Illuminate your house by wiring skills.
events.name: Wireman
events.round1Description: Quiz on basics of electrical.
events.round2Description: we will give equivalent resistance and participants have to make series parallel combination and make one circuit which have total resistance which was given by us (they also have to identify resistance of resistor base on colour-code)
events.round3Description: Designing a Detailed wiring system of a house in a drawing sheet.

events.eventDescription: Be the pirates of electrica.
events.name: Twisted Electrica
events.round1Description: Electrical + Basic Electronics Crossword
events.round2Description: Treasure hunt
events.round3Description: Based on the points of the first two rounds you will be given virtual money that will be used  to buy the components for making a mini project and selling it to the jury.

events.eventDescription: Know how your PC works!!
events.name: OS Revolution
events.round1Description: Quiz on general knowledge of operating system.(ex. Name latest android OS)
events.round2Description: open book surprise round.

events.eventDescription: Equal parts, swagger and smart!!
events.name: Huntware
events.round1Description: Hardware Quiz
events.round2Description: Treasure Hunt
events.round3Description: Surprise Round

events.eventDescription: Bid your tags or pack your bags.
events.name: <TAGS>
events.round1Description: Treasure hunt on html/CSS/JavaScript.
events.round2Description: One has to draw picture and team members have to identify the word from picture.
events.round3Description: bidding on tags and web developing.

events.eventDescription: Buzz,Code,Distract
events.name: Ultimate Coding Challenge
events.round1Description: Buzzer round on C and C++.
events.round2Description: Two members will be given two different programs to solve independently. One Encryption Program need to be solved by both team members together.
events.round3Description: Open ground Programming with full distractions.

events.eventDescription: Be like Bill
events.name: Office Suite
events.round1Description: Purely windows based quiz.
events.round2Description: Debate on technical topic.
events.round3Description:
Windows office suite.
Create a newsletter in word
Create a poster in PowerPoint presentation
Create a excel sheet as given by organizer

events.eventDescription: Your troops are ready for battle
events.name: Battle Code
events.round1Description: computer world, programming languages, current affairs related quiz.
events.round2Description: Simple code is given to write with their monitors’ screen which would be rotated 180 degrees and keyboards will be reversed.
events.round3Description: 10-15 blocks of code will be given to participants, they have to use those blocks or logic of those blocks and the team to come up with a logical piece of code within minimum time

events.eventDescription: I am not a geek, I am Technocrat!!
events.name: BAT(Be a Technocrate)
events.round1Description: there will be technical quiz based on C/C++, basics of IT/CP, crossword, aptitude
events.round2Description: Program will be given in any programming language, participants have to convert it in C/C++ by understanding the logic.
events.round3Description: one member will be given definition and other will play snake & ladder. Non-tech questions will be asked, and answer of those questions will be used as input in coding of definition.

events.eventDescription:
It’s not only how much load you can bare, keeping the balance is also important.

Participants in team have to build a crane mechanism in 3 hours using popsicle sticks. Thread will be provided for lifting weight. All materials will be provided by management. Crane lifting maximum weight will be declared as winners
events.name: Bob The Builder(Build a Crane)

events.eventDescription:
Shape your idea with clay.
Participants have to build a soil arch using clay bricks. Bricks are to be formed by clay and on next day arch is to be made using that bricks. Weights will be kept on arch for testing and team whose arch is highest load bearing is winner
events.name: Soil a Arch

events.eventDescription: Whole lot of common sense and civil engineering knowledge will lead you towards higher profit in real estate.
events.name: Real Estate
events.round1Description: Business quiz related to conditions, situations, future changes risks, etc. (Mostky related to civil engineering)
events.round2Description: Teams will be provided virtual money and they are supposed to bid on different properties shown on map (provided by management) and different conditions will be given like highway proposal, new bridge construction, legal documentation, etc.

events.eventDescription: Theory to practically. Here CPI is of no concern. How good you are at concept will be checked
events.name: Ignited Minds
events.round1Description: Logical and conceptual MCQ questions based on basic civil engineering.
events.round2Description: Picture Perception of famous civil structures. Hint will be provided
events.round3Description: Real life problems will be given and participants have to give most feasible, economical and effective solution are to be presented in front of jury.

events.eventDescription:
With candy stick and rope, make a bridge of hope.
Participants have to build Cable Bridge using popsicle sticks and thread. All required materials and dimensions of bridge will be provided by management. Bridge which will be able to bear maximum load will be winner. Time: 3 hours
events.name: Kablezubia(cable stayed bridge)

events.eventDescription: To achieve your goal direction is needed; knowledge is important & implementation is must
events.name: Civil Hunt
events.round1Description: Quiz based on general knowledge of famous civil structures and basic surveying.
events.round2Description: Solve clue with help of surveying instruments.
events.round3Description: Simple geometric shapes will be given to team and they have to draw it on ground on very large scale using surveying instruments.
